The prison time, along with a four-million-dollar fine, was handed down eight months after Waksal, 55, pleaded guilty to six charges of a 13-count indictment, including bank fraud, securities fraud and conspiracy to obstruct justice

The ImClone scandal has also resulted in the indictment of Martha Stewart, a friend of Waksal's and founder of the lifestyle business empire, Martha Stewart Living Omnimedia

extent.charseq: indictment accused Stewart of selling 4,000 shares of ImClone's stock after receiving an illegal tip about the FDA's decision on Erbitux

Stewart, 61, pleaded not guilty in court last Wednesday to charges of conspiracy, obstruction of justice and securities fraud
